motd.msg: Acme Airlines is holding a customer conference in January. You are invited to see what a social airline does with snacks, drinks and inflight entertainment. WebSite
Acme Airlines is able to recommend to you places to stay, places to go, and many other important services. Please connect with one of our agents 111-222-333
Acme Airlines invites you to connect with our customer service - 800-800-800.
